name: Mahavir Chemical
overview:
Established in the year 1997, we, “Mahavir Chemical Industries”, are a trusted name engaged in manufacturing, supplying and trading a wide assortment of Industrial Chemical, Water Treatment Chemical and Water Treatment Plant Supplies.

Our Products: Offered products in this range are Sodium Hypochlorite, Stable Bleaching Powder, Non Ferric Alum, Hydrated Lime, Ferric Alum and Liquid Soap Hand Wash. Other products included in this range are Detergent Paste, Liquor Ammonia, Caustic Soda Flack, Liquid Chlorine, Swimming Pool Chemical, Chlorination System and others.

Our Team: We are backed by a team of highly qualified and proficient professionals, who hold a vast industrial experience and commendable knowledge about their respective domains.

Our Quality: Since the time of inception, the main aim of our organization has been to offer an excellent quality range of Industrial Chemical, Water Treatment Chemical and Water Treatment Plant Supplies.

Our Infrastructure: We have a state-of-the-art infrastructure, spread across a vast area of land, segregated properly into various departments, in order to carry out the production process in a smooth and streamlined manner.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client-centric organization, we always emphasize on maximizing the contentment level of our esteemed patrons. For this, we make sure to serve our clients in the most promising manner and therefore we manage to execute entire business operations as per their convenience and interests.

offices.address1: Classic-Gagan Apartment, Takli Sim, T-Point, Hingna Road
